cd:Time.cd:Description: Time of DSR (ZPD time of sweep closest to mean time of first scan this ADSR refers to)

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Number of retrieved pressure/temperature profile points

cd:Array.cd:Description: Number of retrieved VMR profile points
Flags indicating existence of p,T error propagation data

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Number of fitted continuum parameters in p,T retrievals

cd:Array.cd:Description: Number of fitted continuum parameters in VMR retrievals

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Number of fitted instrument offset values in p,T retrievals

cd:Array.cd:Description: Number of fitted instrument offset values in VMR retrievals

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Max number of microwindows per acquisition tangent height used for p, T retrieval

cd:Array.cd:Description: Max number of microwindows per acquisition tangent height used for VMR retrieval

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Total number of p, T microwindows (all altitudes) processed in current scan

cd:Array.cd:Description: Total number of VMR retrieval microwindows (all altitudes) processed in current scan

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Total number of spectral grid points contained in selected p,T microwindows

cd:Array.cd:Description: Total number of spectral grid points contained in selected microwindows for VMR removals

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Number of profile grid points to represent continuum profile data for p,T retrieval

cd:Array.cd:Description: Number of profile grid points to represent continuum profile data for VMR retrievals

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Maximum number of evolution steps reported for p,T retrievals. Refers to corresponding PCD info ADSR.

cd:Array.cd:Description: Maximum number of evolution steps reported for VMR retrievals. Refers to corresponding PCD info ADSR.

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Maximum number of PCD information strings in corresponding PCD info ADSR.
Number of points in base profiles for p,T retrievals

cd:Array.cd:Description: Number of points in base profiles for VMR retrievals

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Number of MW labels within p,T occupation matrix

cd:Array.cd:Description: Number of MW labels within VMR occupation matrix

Offset and size of first corresponding record for the following data-sets: 'SCAN INFORMATION', 'PT RETRIEVAL MDS', 'H2O RETRIEVAL MDS', 'N2O RETRIEVAL MDS', 'HNO3 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'CH4 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'O3 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'NO2 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'F11 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'CLNO RETRIEVAL MDS', 'N2O5 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'F12 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'CCL4 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'COF2 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'F14 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'F22 RETRIEVAL MDS', 'HCN RETRIEVAL MDS', 15 * spare MDS, 'CONTINUUM AND OFFSET MDS', PCS INFORMATION MDS', 'MICROWINDOW OCCUPATION ADS', 'RESIDUAL SPECTRA ADS', and 'PROCESSING PARAMETERS ADS'. Order of data sets depends on contents of ORDER_OF_SPECIES field in SPH

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Offset of first DSR. Set to -1 if DSR is missing.
